definition: to nestle against/to snuggle up to

sentences.english: He buried his head in her shoulder and wept.
sentences.chinese: 他把头偎在她的肩上，抽泣着。

sentences.english: and though she leaned ever so lightly, the need seemed satisfied.
sentences.chinese: 虽然偎靠得很轻很轻，她的需要却似乎得到了满足。

sentences.english: Here friend by friend in bloody channel lies.
sentences.chinese: 朋友偎靠着朋友，都在血泊中横躺。

sentences.english: The Xiao Xiao, I rested on your chest.
sentences.chinese: 夜风萧萧，我偎在你的胸口睡觉。

definition: to nestle against/to snuggle up to
to curl up (like a scroll)/to huddle/Melania libertina/wriggle (as a worm)
to hug/to embrace/to hold in one's arms
to draw towards oneself/to gather/to gather up (one's gown, sleeves etc)/to grab (money)/to extort
lit. heads rubbing together (idiom)/fig. very close relationship
to doze/to take a nap/nodding off to sleep
to curl up/to lie with knees drawn up/to huddle up
to hold/to embrace/to wrap around/to gather around (sb)/to throng/to swarm/to support/Taiwan pr. [yong3]
